close(uint256).details: Closes the user's position and returns the trade result after processing.

params.positionId: Ths id of the user position to be closed.

returns.perpTradeResult: The result of the processed trade.

confirmLiquidation(address,uint256).details: Confirms the liquidation for a given filler pool.

execLiquidationCall(uint256,(address,byt.details: Anyone can liquidate position but only filler can cover negative margin

params.settlementData: The route of settlement created by liquidator

executeOrder((bytes,bytes),(address,byte.details: Fillers can open position and anyone can close position

params.settlementData: The route of settlement created by filler

depositToInsurancePool(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposits margin to the insurance pool.

execLiquidationCall(uint256,(address,byt.notice: Executes liquidation call for the position

executeOrder((bytes,bytes),(address,byte.notice: Verifies signature of the order and executes trade

withdrawFromInsurancePool(uint256,uint25.notice: Withdraws margin from the insurance pool.
